name: Eye of the Illusion DX
description:
Story: Illusion is the evil dark enchantress fairy who try to creating sparks and summon enslaved skeletons from her victims to take over the cartoon universe. You are the only hope to defeat Illusion and save the universe.

Object: The object of the game is to get all the jawbreakers with out getting hit by Illusion's goon. The levels range from easy to hard but its quite easy once you get the hang of it.

Character

1. Hyper - Blue Fox
2. Zara - Red Marbley
3. Arnold - Yellow Bear
4. Rocket - Green Alien Fox

Controls

Menu:
1. Start the Game - Space
2. Help Screen - F1
3. Go Back (select screen) - Backspace
4. Show the Highscore Table - F8
5. Erase the Highscore Table (confirm first) - F12
6. Switch Screen Mode - F4
7. Quit the Game - ESC
8. Toggle Music - M
9. Enter a Code (confirm first) - F10

Levels:
1. Q-Key - Start Over
2. P-Key - Pause the Game
3. F9 - Take Picture of Game

Player 1:
1. Move Up - Up Arrow or W
2. Move Down - Down Arrow or S
3. Move Left - Left Arrow or A
4. Move Right - Right Arrow or D
5. Shoot Bomb - Space Bar or E

Player 2:
1. Move Up - Letter I or Keypad 8
2. Move Down - Letter K or Keypad 2
3. Move Left - Letter J or Keypad 4
4. Move Right - Letter L or Keypad 6

Good Things

1. Blue Jawbreaker - +250 Points
2. Green Jawbreaker - +500 Points
3. Red Jawbreaker - +1000 Points
4. Yellow Jawbreaker - +2000 Points
5. Purple Jawbreaker - Destroys All Stop Signs
6. Orange Jawbreaker - Lights All Black Wall
7. Bomb - Makes You Able To Fire A Bomb
8. Teleporter - Teleport To Another Location
9. Checkered Flag - Go To Next Level
10. Rainbow Jawbreaker - Extra Life

Sound: If you hear a cash register, it means you've found a hidden jawbreaker worth 5,000 points. They are in every level, and stay in the same spot everytime you play.

Bad Things

Enemies:
1. Spark - Go Back To Start and -1500 Points
2. Phosphorous Fire - Go Back To Start and -1500 Points
3. Skeleton - Go Back To Start and -1500 Points
4. Red Spark - Go Back To Start and -1500 Points
5. Aggressive Killer Dog - Go Back To Start and -1500 Points
6. Reaver-Bot - Go Back To Start and -1500 Points
7. Red Skeleton - Go Back To Start and -1500 Points

Bosses:
1. Evil Heart - Go Back To Start and -2500 Points
2. Dark Jawbreaker - Go Back To Start and -2500 Points
3. Lore Golem - Go Back To Start and -2500 Points
4. Giant Skeleton - Go Back To Start and -2500 Points
5. Mega Furious Aggressive Killer Dog - Go Back To Start and -2500 Points
6. Infernal Machine - Go Back To Start and -2500 Points
7. Face of Illusion - Go Back To Start and -2500 Points
8. Illusion (Chaos Incarnate) - Go Back To Start and -5000 Points

Bosses Attacks:
1. Laser - Go Back To Start and -2500 Points
2. Illusion's Spark - Go Back To Start and -2500 Points
3. Illusion's Dark Spark - Go Back To Start and -5000 Points

Credit

YoYo Games: This game was only made with the help of the "Game Maker". You can go to their site to download it and make you own games by going here: "http://www.yoyogames.com/"

Teleport Sound by Sith Mas

(Nosoapradio.us):
Level_1 = StarFlake
Level_2 = Solar
Level_3 = DesolateWorld
Level_4 = 909 Dreams
Level_5 = RunningForOurLives
Level_6 = Robotix
Dark_Level = Darkening
Boss_Theme = LaserGun
Final_Boss_Theme = Darkseid
Final_Final_Boss_Theme = Darkess
Ending = EndingCredits
